McKinney.Lowry Crossing, Texas:
Lowry Crossing is a city in Collin County, Texas, United States. The population was 1,711 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
Lowry Crossing is located at 33°10′01″N 96°32′55″W.
According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of 2.8 square miles (7.3 km2), all of it land.
